name: Mellon
description: A book club for exploring the works of J.R.R. Tolkien. Say friends, and enter!

name: Banned Books Brigade
description: A club dedicated to reading and discussing books that have been banned or challenged. Fight against censorship!

name: Evergreen Book Club
description: A club for readers who love timeless classics and modern masterpieces.

name: A Song of Ice and Fire
description: A club for fans of George R.R. Martin's epic series. Join us in waiting the next book :(

name: YA Fantasy Lovers
description: A club for young adult fantasy enthusiasts. Explore magical worlds and epic adventures together!
